## Model.create() method

Shortcut for saving one or more documents to the database. MyModel.create(docs) does new MyModel(doc).save() for every doc in docs. Triggers the save() hook.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
create<T extends Document>(this: Ctor<T>, docs: any[], callback?: (err: any, res: T[]) => void): Promise<T[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  this | [Ctor](./goosetyped.ctor.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; |  |
|  docs | any\[\] |  |
|  callback | (err: any, res: T\[\]) =&gt; void |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;T\[\]&gt;
